channel.description: Recent content in SqlServer module on Pip.Services Docs

item.title: Toolkit_api: Build
item.description:
Types

DefaultSqlServerFactory

Creates SqlServer components by their descriptors.

item.title: Toolkit_api: Connect
item.description:
Types

SqlServerConnection

SqlServer connection using the default driver.

SqlServerConnectionResolver

Helper class that resolves a SqlServer connection and credential parameters, validates them and generates a connection URI.

item.title: Toolkit_api: Persistence
item.description:
Types

IdentifiableJsonSqlServerPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in SqlServer in JSON or JSONB fields and implements a number of CRUD operations over data items with unique ids.

IdentifiableSqlServerPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in SqlServer and implements a number of CRUD operations over data items with unique ids.

SqlServerPersistence

Abstract persistence component that stores data in SqlServer using the default driver.
